column4: I wanted to know if there was a way to run ubuntu from a flashdrive with different applications then the ones already installed
make a persistent install and boot it, install the software. It should retain the software from then on.

There's a guide around for a custom install disk, I made one awhile ago with OpenOffice and most stuff removed to run virus scans on windows partitions ;-) I would help you but I gtg, try searching around on the web.
